targets.sql: show mnodes
label_values(taos_cluster_info_first_ep{cluster="$cluster"}, value)
select last(version) from log.cluster_info

panels.description: MNode 被选举后经过的时长

targets.sql: select last(master_uptime) from log.cluster_info

panels.title: Master Uptime

targets.sql: select last(expire_time) from log.grants_info

panels.description: 企业版授权已用测点数

targets.sql: select max(timeseries_used) as used ,max(timeseries_total) as total from log.grants_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval(30s)

panels.title: Used Meassuring Points

targets.sql: show databases;

panels.description: 所有数据库的表数量之和

targets.sql: show databases;

panels.title: Tables

targets.sql: select connections_total from log.cluster_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to

panels.description: 当前TDengine集群DNode数量，Alive 为存活，Total 为所有

targets.sql: select dnodes_total as total,dnodes_alive as alive from log.cluster_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to

panels.title: DNodes

panels.description: 当前TDengine集群MNode数量，Alive 为存活，Total 为所有

targets.sql: select mnodes_total as total,mnodes_alive as alive from log.cluster_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to

panels.title: MNodes

panels.description: 当前TDengine集群 VGroups 数量，Alive 为存活，Total 为所有

targets.sql: select vgroups_total as total, vgroups_alive as alive from log.cluster_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to

panels.title: VGroups

panels.description: 当前TDengine集群 VNodes 数量，Alive 为存活，Total 为所有

targets.sql: select vnodes_total as total, vnodes_alive as alive from log.cluster_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to

panels.title: VNodes

targets.sql: select avg(dnodes_alive)/avg(dnodes_total) from log.cluster_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval(30s) fill(null)
select avg(mnodes_alive)/avg(mnodes_total) from log.cluster_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval(30s) fill(null)
select avg(vgroups_alive)/avg(vgroups_total) from log.cluster_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval(30s) fill(null)
select avg(vnodes_alive)/avg(vnodes_total) from log.cluster_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval(30s) fill(null)
select avg(timeseries_used)/avg(timeseries_total) as percent from log.grants_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval(30s) fill(null)
select last(expire_time) as expire_time from log.grants_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval(30s) fill(null)
select derivative(errors, 1s, 1) as errors from (select sum(errors) as errors from log.dnodes_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval(1s))
select last(uptime) from log.dnodes_info where ts >= now -1m and ts <= now group by dnode_ep
select avg(dnodes_total) as total, avg(dnodes_alive) as alive from log.cluster_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select avg(dnodes_total) as total, avg(dnodes_alive) as alive from log.cluster_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select avg(mnodes_total) as total, avg(mnodes_alive) as alive from log.cluster_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)

select sum(req_insert) as insert_count, sum(req_insert_success) as insert_success, sum(req_insert_batch) as insert_batches, sum(req_insert_batch_success) as insert_batch_success from log.dnodes_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null) group by dnode_ep
select sum(req_insert_success)  / sum(req_insert) as success_rate from log.dnodes_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null) group by dnode_ep
select sum(req_insert) as total_inserts, sum(req_insert_batch) as total_batches from log.dnodes_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select sum(req_insert_success)  / sum(req_insert) as success_rate from log.dnodes_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select avg(req_insert_rate) as insert_rate, avg(req_insert_batch_rate) as batch_rate from log.dnodes_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null) group by dnode_ep

select avg(insert_rate) as cluster_insert_rate, avg(batch_rate) as cluster_batch_rate from (select sum(req_insert_rate) as insert_rate,  sum(req_insert_batch_rate) as batch_rate from log.dnodes_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval(1s)) where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select sum(req_select) as req_select from log.dnodes_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null) group by dnode_ep
select sum(req_select) as total from log.dnodes_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select avg(req_select_rate) as req_select_rate from log.dnodes_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null) group by dnode_ep

select avg(req_select_rate) as req_select_rate from (select sum(req_select_rate) as req_select_rate from log.dnodes_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval(1s)) where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select sum(req_http) as req_http from log.dnodes_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null) group by dnode_ep
select sum(req_http) as req_http from log.dnodes_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select avg(req_http_rate) as req_http_rate from log.dnodes_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null) group by dnode_ep

select avg(req_http_rate) as req_http_rate from (select sum(req_http_rate) as req_http_rate from log.dnodes_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval(1s)) where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
show $database.stables;

select last(tables_num) as tables_num from (select last(ts) as ts, sum(tables_num) as tables_num from log.vgroups_info where ts > $from and ts <= $to and database_name = '$database' group by ts) where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select max(tables_num) as tables_num from log.vgroups_info where ts > $from and ts <= $to and database_name = '$database' interval($interval) fill(null) group by vgroup_id

panels.description: 所有普通表的个数（包括超级表的子表）

targets.sql: select last(tables_num) from (select last(ts) as ts, sum(tables_num) as tables_num from log.vgroups_info where ts > $from and ts <= $to and database_name = '$database' group by ts)

panels.title: Total Tables

panels.description: 超级表的所有子表个数

targets.sql: show $database.stables;

panels.title: Sub Tables

targets.sql: select last(uptime) as uptime  from log.dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn'
select last(has_mnode) as has_mnode  from log.dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts < $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select last(cpu_cores) as uptime  from log.dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' interval ($interval)
select last(vnodes_num) as vnodes_num  from log.dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts < $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select last(masters) as masters  from log.dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts < $to interval($interval) fill(null)

panels.description: 当前 taosd 线程 CPU 使用率

targets.sql: select  last(cpu_engine)  from log.dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts < $to

panels.title: Current CPU  Usage of taosd

panels.description: 当前 taosd 线程 内存 使用率

targets.sql: select  last(mem_engine) as taosd, last(mem_total) as total  from log.dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts < $to
select  last(mem_engine) as taosd, last(mem_total) as total  from log.dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts < $to

panels.title: Current Memory Usage of taosd

targets.sql: select last(disk_used) as used, last(disk_total) as total,  last(disk_used) / last(disk_total) as percent  from log.dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts < $to
select last(disk_used) as used, last(disk_total) as total,  last(disk_used) / last(disk_total) as percent  from log.dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts < $to
select last(disk_used) as used, last(disk_total) as total,  last(disk_used) / last(disk_total) as percent  from log.dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts < $to
select  avg(cpu_engine) as taosd, avg(cpu_system) as system from log.dnodes_info where dnode_ep='$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts < $to  interval($interval) fill(null)
select  avg(cpu_engine) as taosd, avg(cpu_system) as system from log.dnodes_info where dnode_ep='$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts < $to  interval($interval) fill(null)
select avg(mem_engine) as taosd, avg(mem_system) as system, avg(mem_total) as total from log.dnodes_info where dnode_ep='$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts < $to  interval($interval) fill(null)
select avg(mem_engine) as taosd, avg(mem_system) as system, avg(mem_total) as total from log.dnodes_info where dnode_ep='$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts < $to  interval($interval) fill(null)
select avg(mem_engine) as taosd, avg(mem_system) as system, avg(mem_total) as total from log.dnodes_info where dnode_ep='$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts < $to  interval($interval) fill(null)

select avg(datadir_l0_used) as level0_used, avg(datadir_l0_total) as level0_total, avg(datadir_l1_used) as level1_used, avg(datadir_l1_total) as level1_total, avg(datadir_l2_used) as level2_used, avg(datadir_l2_total) as level2_total from log.disks_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts < $to interval($interval) fill(null)

select avg(datadir_l0_used)/avg(datadir_l0_total) as level0_percent, avg(datadir_l1_used)/avg(datadir_l1_total) as level1_percent , avg(datadir_l2_used)/avg(datadir_l2_total) as level2_percent  from log.disks_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts < $to interval($interval) fill(null)

select avg(datadir_l0_used)/avg(datadir_l0_total) as level0_percent, avg(datadir_l1_used)/avg(datadir_l1_total) as level1_percent , avg(datadir_l2_used)/avg(datadir_l2_total) as level2_percent  from log.disks_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts < $to interval($interval) fill(null)

select avg(datadir_l0_used) as level0_used, avg(datadir_l0_total) as level0_total, avg(datadir_l1_used) as level1_used, avg(datadir_l1_total) as level1_total, avg(datadir_l2_used) as level2_used, avg(datadir_l2_total) as level2_total from log.disks_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts < $to interval($interval) fill(null)

select avg(datadir_l0_used) as level0_used, avg(datadir_l0_total) as level0_total, avg(datadir_l1_used) as level1_used, avg(datadir_l1_total) as level1_total, avg(datadir_l2_used) as level2_used, avg(datadir_l2_total) as level2_total from log.disks_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts < $to interval($interval) fill(null)

select avg(datadir_l0_used) as level0_used, avg(datadir_l0_total) as level0_total, avg(datadir_l1_used) as level1_used, avg(datadir_l1_total) as level1_total, avg(datadir_l2_used) as level2_used, avg(datadir_l2_total) as level2_total from log.disks_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts < $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select derivative(value, 1m, 0) from (select avg(datadir_l0_used) * 1024 as value from log.disks_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts < $to interval($interval) fill(null))
select derivative(value, 1m, 0) from (select avg(datadir_l1_used) * 1024 as value from log.disks_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts < $to interval($interval) fill(null))
select derivative(value, 1m, 0) from (select avg(datadir_l1_used) * 1024 as value from log.disks_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts < $to interval($interval) fill(null))

panels.title: Disk Used Increasing Rate per Minute

targets.sql: select  avg(io_read_disk) as io_read_taosd, avg(io_write_disk) as io_write_taosd from log.dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= now-1h and ts < now  interval($interval) fill(null)
select  avg(io_read_disk) as io_read_taosd, avg(io_write_disk) as io_write_taosd from log.dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= now-1h and ts < now  interval($interval) fill(null)
select  avg(net_in) as net_in, avg(net_out) as net_out from log.dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= now-1h and ts < now  interval($interval) fill(null)
select  avg(net_in) as net_in, avg(net_out) as net_out from log.dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= now-1h and ts < now  interval($interval) fill(null)
select count(*) from log.logs where ts >= $from and ts < $to interval (1m)
